Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.UserController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This is the User Controller that handles all functionality in the for the User Page
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ronak Gandhi(rjg184) and Andrew Lowe(all157)
